body: It’s clay court season in the tennis and as usual I’m puzzled. How does the umpire know which ball mark to check when a line call is disputed? There are hundreds of them … Anna Tomkins, Leeds • Post your answers – and new questions – below or email them to nq@theguardian.com. Please include name, address and phone number.
webTitle: How does the umpire know which mark to check in clay court tennis?
